title: Renzhies
description: The fire of an Iskerkin. The sire of a Midnight Gate. One eipc showdown.Fresh from the victory over the Nri Kryne, Zhin and his family are safely recovering in the Sirix ruins. Little does Zhin suspect his own deadly peril. When Zhin's family discovers his "tug," he's forced to reveal the damning details of the occult miracle of his birth.Now with his world threatening to collapse, Zhin is oblivious that his deadliest enemy has risen from the past and has found him...to bring him "home." If Zhin fails to defeat this beast, he will witness the obliteration of his family and suffer as a madman's mutilated pet until his final breath.Renzhies is the sensational second book in the young adult Monsters and Demons fantasy series. If you love to hate the villain, juicy showdowns, and shocking reveals, then you'll love Mara Duryea's nail-biting book!Buy today and leave your reality behind!
author: Mara Duryea
